mapper.select: select history.id as id, history.question_lib_id as questionLibId, history.user_name as username, history.result as result, history.submit_time as submitTime, history.question_id as questionId from sq_user_question_history as history where history.user_name = #{username} limit #{pagenum},#{pagesize}
select count(*) from sq_user_question_history as history where history.user_name = #{username}
